item.title: The Happiness Advantage Guide and Lessons
item.description: The Happiness Advantage: Your Key to Success and Fulfillment Have you ever wondered why some people seem to breeze through life, succeeding in both work and play, while others struggle to make progress? The secret might surprise you – it’s not about working harder or being smarter. It’s about being happier. This eye-opening idea is at the heart of Shawn Achor’s book, “The Happiness Advantage: How a Positive Brain Fuels Success in Work and Life.
